Key Match Events: Jos Buttler's side lost all ten wickets for 99 runs
Post-Match Reflections: India's win sends them top of the table
England's batting line-up disintegrated under pressure
Others: India took off with Rohit Sharma's aggressive charge
Chris Woakes and David Willey got the best out of the new ball
KL Rahul and Rohit Sharma added 58 runs for India
Suryakumar Yadav kept the run-flow intact
Rohit fell while going for an expansive stroke
England's spin-bowling all-rounders dug in to try and rebuild
India's spinners had limited impact due to dew on the outfield
